title: Friction - describe motion of box on ramp

content.prompt: A box is initially held at rest on a ramp with an incline of 37âˆ˜ with respect to the horizontal and then released. The coefficients of static and kinetic friction between the box and the ramp are 0.50 and 0.20, respectively. Which of the following best describes the motion, if any, of the box after it is released?

choices.label: The box will remain at rest on the incline.
The box will start sliding down the incline at a constant velocity.
The box will start sliding down the incline and then slow down at a constant rate.
The box will start sliding down the incline and then continue to speed up at a constant rate.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
